test-session.content: What spill pallets do you offer?

# Spill Pallets - Justrite Offerings

Based on the information available in my current product documentation, I can confirm that **Justrite offers spill containment solutions**, including flexible containment products made of durable PVC coated fabric that can be used for spill control.

However, I don't have detailed specifications of our complete spill pallet product range in the context available to me right now.

## What I Can Tell You About Spill Containment:

Our spill control products are designed to:
- Keep personnel and the environment protected
- Support sustainability initiatives
- Allow reclamation of spilled liquids
- Comply with EPA and SPCC (Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure) regulations
- Reduce costly environmental fines

## For Detailed Spill Pallet Information:

Please contact our sales team for a comprehensive overview of our spill pallet options and specifications:

📧 **Email:** sales.ro@justrite.com  
📞 **Phone:** +40 751 556 555

They can provide you with detailed product specifications, capacity information, and help you select the right solution for your specific application and chemical compatibility needs.

# Justrite Spill Pallets

I don't have specific details about our complete spill pallet product range in the information available to me right now.

However, I can tell you that Justrite offers **spill containment solutions** designed to:
- Protect personnel and the environment
- Prevent costly EPA fines for contamination
- Support spill prevention and control measures
- Help comply with EPA and SPCC (Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure) regulations

Our spill control products include both **flexible containment** options (typically made of durable PVC coated fabric that folds down for portability) and other containment solutions.

## For Detailed Product Information

To get a comprehensive list of our spill pallet offerings and specifications, please contact:

📞 **+40 751 556 555**  
📧 **sales.ro@justrite.com**

Our sales team can provide you with detailed product specifications, capacities, and recommendations based on your specific application needs.

# NoTrax® Anti-Fatigue Mats Available

Based on our product catalogue, here are the anti-fatigue mats we offer:

## **Foam Mats**

### 425 Posture Mat Classic™
- **Material:** Durable closed cell foam with rubberized sponge
- **Thickness:** 19 mm
- **Weight:** 5.8 kg/m²
- **Surface:** Textured basket weave for grip
- **Features:** Bevelled edges on all four sides to minimize tripping hazards; loose lay installation
- **Best for:** Stationary standing workstations, sit-stand desks, packing stations, office environments, reception areas
- **Stock sizes:** 51×61 cm, 61×182 cm, 91×102 cm, 91×152 cm

### 426 Posture Mat™
- **Features:** Built-in handle for easy carrying/hanging; combines style and comfort
- **Best for:** Adjustable desks, sit-stand desks, standing workstations

## **Rubber Mats - Food Service**

### 455 Skystep™
- **Material:** Natural rubber compound
- **Thickness:** 13 mm | **Weight:** 10 kg/m²
- **Features:** Gritted surface with ergonomic bubble pattern; suction cup design prevents shifting
- **Best for:** Dry areas – food processing, packaging, preparation, bars
- **Stock sizes:** 60×90 cm, 90×120 cm, 90×150 cm

### 562 Sanitop™
- **Material:** Natural rubber compound
- **Thickness:** 12.7 mm | **Weight:** 8 kg/m²
- **Features:** Large drainage holes, raised studs, aggressive slip-resistant surface
- **Best for:** Wet areas – kitchens, cooking lines, food prep, cleaning areas
- **Stock sizes:** 91×152 cm, 91×297 cm

## **Key Benefits**

✓ Reduces fatigue and lower back pain  
✓ Stimulates blood flow and reduces muscle stress  
✓ Slip resistance up to R13 (DIN 51130)  
✓ NFSI® tested and certified  
✓ Improves productivity and employee satisfaction

For more product options or custom solutions, contact:  
📞 **+40 751 556 555**  
📧 **sales.ro@justrite.com**
What certifications do your products have?

# Justrite Product Certifications

Justrite products are tested and approved by leading international certification bodies. Here are the key certifications our products comply with:

## **Safety & Quality Certifications**

| Certification | Standard | Details |
|---|---|---|
| **FM** | FM Approvals | Tested and approved by FM Approvals |
| **UL/ULC** | Underwriters Laboratories | Listed in the U.S. and Canada |
| **TÜV** | Technical Inspection Association | TÜV certified products |
| **GS** | Geprüfte Sicherheit | Safety tested and GS certified by MPA Dresden |
| **CE** | Conformité Européenne | European conformity mark – manufacturer's declaration that products meet applicable EC directives |

## **Fire & Hazardous Materials Standards**

| Certification | Code/Standard | Details |
|---|---|---|
| **N** | NFPA 30 | Flammable and Combustible Liquids Code |
| **O** | OSHA | Occupational Safety and Health Administration Regulations |
| **I** | IFC | International Fire Code |
| **A** | NFPA 1 | Fire Code – 2012 Edition |
| **A9** | NFPA 1 | Fire Code – 2009 Edition |
| **H** | NFPA 400 | Hazardous Material Code |
| **EN** | EN 14470-1 & EN 14727 | European standards for safety cabinets |

## **Compressed Gas & Environmental Standards**

| Certification | Code/Standard | Details |
|---|---|---|
| **C** | CGA | Compressed Gas Association – Safe Handling of Compressed Gases in Containers |
| **G** | NFPA 55 | Compressed Gases and Cryogenic Fluids Code |
| **U** | USGS | U.S. Geological Survey High Hazards Zone Requirements |
| **E** | EPA | Environmental Protection Agency Regulations |
| **S** | EPA SPCC | Supports EPA Spill Prevention, Control and Countermeasures Rule |
| **V** | EPA ETV | Validated by the EPA Environmental Technology Verification Program |

## **Quality Control & Manufacturing Standards**

Our spill containment products are manufactured with rigorous quality controls:

- **UNI EN ISO 3834-2:2021** – Welding quality standards
- **UNI EN ISO 9712:2022** – Non-destructive testing and personnel certification
- **RINA Load Testing** – Load capacity certified by RINA (Registro Italiano Navale)

## **For Specific Product Certifications**

Different product lines may have specific certifications. For detailed information about certifications for a particular product, please contact:

📞 **+40 751 556 555**  
📧 **sales.ro@justrite.com**

Our team can provide complete certification documentation and compliance information for your specific application needs.

test-embed.content: Tell me about spill pallets from the Sall catalogue.

# Spill Pallets from the Sall Catalogue

Based on the Sall Materials Storage and Handling Essentials catalogue, here's what's available:

## **Polyethylene Spill Pallets for Drums**

### POLYSAFE Series (for 200L drums):
- **POLYSAFE1**: Single 200L drum capacity
  - Collection volume: 225L
  - Dimensions: 925 x 755 x 555mm

- **POLYSAFE2P**: Two 200L drums capacity
  - Collection volume: 220L
  - Dimensions: 1265 x 700 x 495mm

- **POLYSAFE4P**: Four 200L drums capacity
  - Collection volume: 450L
  - Dimensions: 1280 x 1280 x 485mm

### **Key Features:**
- **Sturdy construction** using rotational molding process
- **High corrosion resistance** - made of polyethylene
- **Chemical compatibility** - suitable for acids, bases, oils, and non-flammable chemical substances
- **Removable polyethylene grid** for easy cleaning
- **Stackable design** when empty to save transport and storage space
- **Forklift/pallet truck compatible**
- Standard light black color

## **Spill Pallets for IBCs (1000L)**

- **POLYSAFE1IBCP**: Single 1000L IBC capacity
  - Collection volume: 1100L
  - Dimensions: 1380 x 1280 x 1000mm

For more detailed specifications or to discuss your specific needs, contact **sales.ro@justrite.com** or **+40 751 556 555**.
